attributes.action: Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work
attributes.additional_details: After a list I posted of what healthcare workers have to actually do every day and expressing my anger at healthcare workers being called unskilled went viral on Facebook with thousands of the UK public also sharing my anger, I decided to start a campaign for the government to recognise their work and give them better pay.
attributes.background: I would like the government to review and increase the pay for healthcare workers to recognise the work that they do.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
